text: 2.5: Stt 6.1–7.24; 8.18; Hi 11.7; 1 Pi 3.20; 2 Pi 3.6Mba fhum kegi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe vhɨra kɨr Fhe Bakɨme segim, ana fhura mbe gangi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana mbɨ bakɨme sarigim, ana zerav, vhuuŋgia ndav, mbe kharigim, mbe vhɨzgiap, fhɨreregi. Mba tugen, Noa, ana nduara, Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvir vhuuiŋ bun nzuai guma ma. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme ana garav, vhɨra harathɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana mbe garim, mbe nzerara kegi, mbe vhɨzgi fhuvara.
